column5: 他們昨天簽署了一份協議。

column4: The air is fresh in the mountains.
I sent the letter by airmail.
column5: 我用航空郵件寄了那封信。

column4: The airplane took off on time.
We arrived at the airport early.
All the students passed the exam.
column5: 所有學生都通過了考試。

column4: My parents don’t allow me to stay out late.
column5: 我的父母不允許我晚歸。
差不多到吃晚餐的時間了。

column4: He lives alone in a small house.
column5: 他獨自住在一間小房子裡。
